授業目的: To build on students' speaking and listening skills, improve vocabulary and enhance self-expression in English.
到達目標: Students should have reached a higher level of speaking fluency with a greater use of active vocabulary, and an ability to function naturally in a variety of situations.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

トピック.授業計画1:
The class will be managed with Google Classroom. Please be sure to check there for information regarding the class.

Each lesson shall begin with a warm-up and listening exercise. The students will then practice a range of communicative skills such as expressing opinions and sharing ideas, discussions, roleplays, and interviews, in relation to popular topics. Some of the themes covered will include things such such as sports and leisure, art and literature, cultural comparisons, and travelling. Each class will end with a song.
トピック.授業外学習2: You will be given homework every week. Be sure to review each lesson and prepare for the next class. Keep trying and progress will come. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
